verbose_text: The MEK inhibitor, U0126, completely suppressed the TGF-beta-induced ECM mineralization in the UE7T-13 cell culture (XREF_FIG; lane 3); PDGF alone did not promote osteogenic activity (XREF_FIG; lane 4), but enhanced the TGF-beta-induced ECM mineralization (XREF_FIG; lane 6).
evidence: U0126, completely suppressed the TGF-beta-induced ECM
